synopsis.text:
Haru and Rin, two childhood friends with a shared passion for swimming, are reunited when Rin's old friend, Sousuke Yamazaki, transfers to Samezuka Academy. Together with Momotarou Mikoshiba, the younger brother of Captain Mikoshiba, and the dedicated Aiichirou Nitori, they form a formidable relay team. As they navigate through tournaments, training sessions, and races, their bond deepens, and their shared love for swimming strengthens.

However, Sousuke's sudden return to Samezuka Academy begins to weigh on him, affecting his performance in the pool. Noticing the change in his friend, Rin takes it upon himself to uncover the hidden truth behind Sousuke's return.

This second part of Free!: Timeless Medley, which primarily recaps the events of Eternal Summer and some of the first season, focuses on Rin and his team at Samezuka. The movie also features new scenes and characters from High Speed, adding an extra layer of excitement to the story.

As Haru and Rin face new challenges and obstacles, they must rely on their unbreakable bond and the support of their friends to overcome them. With their sights set on a bright future, they're determined to make a splash and leave their mark in the world of competitive swimming.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
